Package digital.ivan.lightchain.core.chain.impl

Class AgentRoutedChain

java.lang.Object
digital.ivan.lightchain.core.chain.impl.AgentRoutedChain
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISyncChain<ToolCall,Map<String,String>>
public class AgentRoutedChain extends Object implements ISyncChain<ToolCall,Map<String,String>>
Represents a processing chain for routing agents based on the interaction with a language learning model (LLM). The AgentRoutedChain class handles the process of generating ToolCall outputs based on map inputs.

Two primary constructors allow for configuration flexibility. The first constructor requires an additional IPromptTemplateProvider parameter, whereas the second one defaults to using AgentRoutedPromptTemplateProvider.

The processing workflow within this chain consists of:

  1. Preparing parameters, particularly the tools description and tools list.
  2. Calling the LLM model to get a raw output based on the parameters.
  3. Parsing the raw output using the provided IOutputParser to generate a ToolCall output.

Logging is integrated at various points in the processing chain to provide insights and traceability.

Author:
Ivan Potapov
